byline.contributor: Alan Rappeport contributed reporting, and Kitty Bennett research.
byline.original: By STEVE EDER and JONATHAN MARTIN

abstract: Undercover videos show two Democratic National Committee operatives discussing use of unseemly tactics such as inciting violence at Donald Trump rallies and arranging fraudulent voting; Democratic Party casts doubt on trustworthiness of videos, which were released by Project Veritas, conservative group that has been criticized for deceptive editing.
lead_paragraph: The undercover videos showed Democratic operatives discussing unseemly tactics like instigating violence at Trump rallies and arranging for fraudulent voting.
snippet: The undercover videos showed Democratic operatives discussing unseemly tactics like instigating violence at Trump rallies and arranging for fraudulent voting....

headline.main: Videos Put Democrats on Defensive About Dirty Tricks
headline.print_headline: Videos Force Democrats on Defensive About Tricks
